outputs.output_descr:
GoI and civil society have stregnthened participatory mechanisms in place for electoral processes, national dialogue and reconciliation.
Outputs of the project:
1: Map existing GOI reconciliation efforts
2: Capacity building and technical support given to GOI on reconciliation and DDR
3: Increased awareness on best practices for reconciliation at GOI 
4: Road UN map/programme designed to support reconciliation efforts in Iraq

project_descr: Support to national reconciliation efforts by introducing models of reconciliation and transitional justice.
